name: Fish & Dagger
description:
Let’s turn up that camp dial until it falls off, shall we? Spies. Evil doctors. Gunsmoke. A little silly. A little deadly. Six endings. One BAD ending. You probably want the BAD ending. Scene select is unlocked after your first run. Sound on. Watch where you’re pointing that knife, my dear!

**Best played on a computer or tablet.**

Fish & Dagger is a multimedia-filled, comedy spy-thriller with an existential twist. It was voted "Best in Show" at the Spring Thing 2021 Interactive Fiction Festival.

Please check out the other festival entries here!

Content Warning
This story contains gore, violence, body horror, swearing, and suspense-action. There are two time-sensitive scenarios that may cause anxiety in some players. There are also some sudden noises.

Privacy Warning
This story uses augmented reality and interactive text. At one point, it will ask to open your phone camera or webcam to view the story’s AR content. I have built this web app with open source software, AR.js, Twine, and A-Frame. I am in no way storing, monitoring, or nefariously collecting any kind of data or content from you! The webpage is opening your camera to display the nifty / spooky AR stuff for the story of these processes take place locally on your device.
